message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. What do you think?

I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe it's a bit pricey, but I'm willing to pay a premium for something I think will be valuable. Can you meet me at $700000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns about the price, but I believe the product's value is higher than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $750000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $725000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $740000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $720000 for the product. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.

I understand that you've made a final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $720000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers and sell it to you for $730000. This is my final offer.

I'm surprised you're willing to meet me halfway again, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $715000 for the product. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.
I understand that you've made a final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $715000. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $725000. This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to go above $720000, Alice. I think that's a fair price considering our negotiations. I'm willing to meet you at $720000. This is my last offer.
